data.text: “Montie me, mo a mopɛ tenenee akyiri kwan;
Monhwɛ Abraham mo agya,
Awurade bɛkyekye Sion werɛ ampa ara
“Montie me, me nkurɔfoɔ;
Me tenenee reba ntɛm so,
Mompagya mo ani nhwɛ ɔsorosoro,
“Montie me, mo a monim deɛ ɛteneɛ,
Na nweweboa bɛwe wɔn te sɛ deɛ wɔwe atadeɛ;
Nyane, nyane! Ao Awurade basa
Ɛnyɛ wo na womaa ɛpo weeɛ,
Wɔn a Awurade apata ama wɔn bɛsane aba.
“Me, me ara, mene wo werɛ kyekyefoɔ.
Na wo werɛ afiri Awurade, wo yɛfoɔ,
Ɛrenkyɛre, wɔbɛgyaa nneduafoɔ ahufoɔ no;
Na mene Awurade, wo Onyankopɔn
Mede me nsɛm ahyɛ wʼanomu,
Nyane, nyane!
Wo mma a wowoo wɔn nyinaa mu
Saa ɔhaw prenu yi aba wo so,
Wo mma atotɔ baha;
Enti tie yei, wo a worehunu amaneɛ
Yei ne deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade,
Mede bɛhyɛ wɔn a wɔha mo no nsa mu,
